titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Honolulu Little League Baseball team of Hawaii on winning the 2018 Little League Baseball World Series Championship.
A resolution congratulating the Honolulu Little League Baseball team of Hawaii on winning the 2018 Little League Baseball World Series Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Honolulu Little League Baseball team on its 2018 Little League Baseball World Series Championship.
